scripts.start: cd examples && cd docs && yarn start
scripts.build: cd examples && cd docs && yarn build
scripts.deploy: cd examples && cd docs && yarn deploy
scripts.rollup: cd packages && cd core && yarn rollup -c
scripts.watch: cd packages && cd core && yarn jest --watch --runInBand
scripts.cov: cd packages && cd core && yarn jest --coverage
scripts.npm: cd packages && cd core && yarn publish
scripts.ls: cd packages && cd core && npm pack --dry-run
